TopicTitle: Each type of deployable science only works once for one plant

Articles.Content:
Hi, I am kinda new to this game. Feel there is not much documentation about deployable science mechanism so I experimented it little bit and have my conclusions. Just want to confirm for all types deployable science (like go-ob, weather) will stop giving more science after reaching 100% . Redeployment with new ones after that will not help. So I only need to carry each type to a planet once  in the whole game.  Wonder if there is a real point for a 5-star scientist to deploy them since anywhere other than Kerbin will generate science pretty quickly. 

Thanks!
This is correct, and welcome to the forum.
